item.title: The Spark
item.description: Google Summer of Code! The summer just got better! Having worked with Tensorflow for quite some time, I was impressed by how amazing the library was, well not a surprise as it is being backed by Google! Thats when I noticed that though the core of the Tensorflow architecture is written in C++ and exposed through a C API, only Python has a complete wrapper which users could easily use to design neural nets.
